game.beginning: In a post-apocalyptic world, the city of Elyria lies in ruins. The once-great metropolis is now a mere shadow of its former self, ravaged by war and environmental disaster.
game.ending: With the help of her companions, Lyra defeats the tyrannical ruler and shatters the curse that has held Elyria hostage for so long. As the city begins to heal, Lyra sets out on a new journey, determined to explore the world beyond Elyria's borders.
game.synopsis: In "Shadows of Elyria," players take on the role of Lyra, a young survivor with a rare gift – the ability to harness the power of the planet. As she navigates the treacherous landscape of Elyria, Lyra must confront her own demons and team up with a motley crew of allies to overthrow the ruthless forces that seek to control the city.
game.title: Shadows of Elyria
